---
id: delete-all-messages-from-a-group-member
title: "ClearMemberGroupMessage"
description: "By calling this API, you can delete all messages from a specific user in a group chat conversation on the server side. Only the specified user will not be able to see these messages; other group members will not be affected."
api: 
info_path: core_products/zim/en/docs_zim_server/Messaging/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>ClearMemberGroupMessage</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>



By calling this API, you can delete all messages from a specific user in a group chat conversation on the server side. Only the specified user will not be able to see these messages; other group members will not be affected.

<Note title="QPS Limit"> 20 times/s</Note>

## Request
